entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @IvankaTrump @POTUS @WhiteHouse This week Donald Trump suggested using bleach and uv light to kill Covid-19 had merit. Go back to NYC, princess, your days in the WH are coming to an end. #BlueWave2020
